title: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
description: When importing a new image into the layout again, the image is not refreshed. Instead, the original image is still displayed.
OB: Image can't be refreshed after importing again.
EB: After importing a new image into the layout again, the new image should be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce this issue, please follow these steps:
1. Import a new image named 'image1.jpg' into the layout.
2. Delete the 'image1.jpg' file from the outline image.
3. Rename 'image2.jpg' to 'image1.jpg'.
4. Import the renamed 'image1.jpg' into the layout again, and observe that the original image is still displayed instead of the new image.
